listings.Description of job/activites: Access data, construct and manipulate large datasets to support planned analyses using SQL, Python and similar tools; Design and develop BI dashboards using Sisense or similar tools for various organisational metrics and indicators; Help with defining KPIs metrics and drive data governance; Develop analysis and reporting capabilities and monitor performance; Research and validate entity data; Liaise and analyse across projects; Analyze specification for systems interfaces and workflow solutions; Participate in design and implementation of experiments.
listings.Requirements/qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in statistics, mathematics, computer science, or related field; Proficient in SQL; Proficient in Microsoft Excel; Knowledge of statistics and experience with statistical packages; Excellent verbal and written communication; Strong problem solving skills.
